post.summary: Uploads a file and returns the asset path for use in /findings endpoint requests
post.description: Uploads a file and returns the asset path for use in /findings endpoint requests

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

get.summary: Downloads an asset by path. Redirects to a temporary download URL
get.description: Downloads an asset by path. Redirects to a temporary download URL

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

404.description: The requested entity was not found

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Return items created before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: createdOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return items created on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: modifiedBefore
parameters.description: Return items modified before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: modifiedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return items modified on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The logical number of page to return, starting from 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: How many records to return (50 by default)

parameters.name: includeTotal
parameters.description: Whether total count should be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Applies sorting by the specified field:\
"?sort=+FieldName" for ascending order,\
"?sort=-FieldName" for descending order.\
\
Available fields are: ID, CreatedOn, ModifiedOn

parameters.name: active
parameters.description:
What kind of items should be returned (only active items will be returned by default)\
Values: [True, Any, False]

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by server

traceId.description: Internal trace ID for advanced diagnostics

errors.description: Provides more details about errors occurred, which can potentially be used for visual display

data.description: Provides additional data, intended for programmatical usage

ApiErrorResponse.description: Detailed error response, following RFC 7807 recommendations (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807).

path.description: File path returned from upload, used to reference this asset in finding operations

EquipmentSystems.V2.FindingAssetUploadRe.description: Result of an asset file upload operation

page.description: From which page this output has started

pageSize.description: Page size for this query (i.e. how many records were requested to return)

hasMore.description: True if there are more records in the query than returned in this result

totalCount.description: Total count of records for this query (can optionally be populated)

data.description: The collection of result items, will never have more than PageSize items

locationId.description: ID of the customer location where the finding was identified

name.description: Title summarizing the issue or observation

description.description: Detailed description of the issue, condition, or observation

recommendedSolution.description: Suggested action or repair to address the finding

internalNotes.description: Private notes for internal use, not visible to customers

installedEquipmentId.description: ID of the specific equipment where the finding was observed (if applicable)

urgencyLevel.description: Priority level indicating how urgently the finding should be addressed

sourceJobId.description: ID of the job during which this finding was discovered (if applicable)

archived.description: Whether the finding has been archived and is no longer active

active.description: Whether the finding is currently active in the system

createdBy.description: ID of the user who created the finding

modifiedBy.description: ID of the user who last updated the finding

createdOn.description: Timestamp when the finding was created (UTC)

modifiedOn.description: Timestamp when the finding was last updated (UTC)
